summary: Simple mod - Adds more gold to Black Market Dremora Merchant.
descriptionHtml:
Project: Black Market More Gold
Author: Hayk94
Version: 1.1 
Release Date: 24.02.2013
Category: Mercantiles
Website(s): 

Skyrim Nexus - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32278

==================
Requirements:
==================

Skyrim 1.8.151.0
Dragonborn

==================
Description:
==================

Simple mod - Adds more gold to Black Market Dremora Merchant.


==================
Details:
==================

There is a cool feature in DragonBorn DLC, you can summon a Dremora merchant any time to sell things but still his gold was not enough to buy all the junk I collect from the dungeons. So simply I just add him more gold for myself and put here in case anybody needs him to be wealthier too.


==================
Installation:
==================

------------------------------
Manual Instructions
------------------------------

1) Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into your Data folder
2) Make sure the BMmoregold.esp is checked in the Launcher

Or simply install through NMM.



==================
Un-Installation:
==================

------------------------------
Manual Instructions
------------------------------

1) Unheck the BMmoregold.esp in the Launcher
2) Delete the BMmoregold.esp




==================
Changelog:
==================

24.02.2013 - 1.1
Bugfix, now player gets proper gold for sold items.
24.02.2013 - Initial Release


==================
Credits:
==================

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to InsanitySorrow for the ReadMe Generator this ReadMe is based on.



==================
Tools Used:
==================

ReadMe Generator

Creation Kit

==================
Licensing/Legal:
==================

You can do whatever you wish with this, just do not complain if something goes wrong.

Credit for my work would be appreciated.
author: Hayk94

files.changelogHtml: Fixed the bug of the frozen gold amount
